hero.title: The Next Answer
hero.subtitle: Leading the Future at Taejae University

items.description: Explore an infinite range of possibilities. At Taejae, design your interdisciplinary major as unique as you are. Discover how our customizable programs empower you to shape your own academic journey.
The world is your classroom and the earth is your syllabus. Explore our seven campuses around the world and grow endlessly.
Are you an innovative problem solver? Are you an empathetic global leader? Are you an adaptable and forward-thinking visionary? Then join us!

Be 100% YOU!
At Taejae University, you'll not only grow academically but also embrace your true self. Experience cultural exchanges, engage in extracurricular activities, and fully express who you are!
Taejae is Korea's first fully hybrid university, pioneering a new model of global, flexible education.

hero.title: What do you learn?
hero.description1: At Taejae University, you'll experience a transformative, interdisciplinary education designed to equip you with the competencies needed to thrive in our rapidly changing world. Our curriculum transcends traditional boundaries, combining broad foundational knowledge with deep specialized expertise.
hero.description2: From mastering critical thinking and innovation foundations to exploring the frontiers of convergence studies, you'll be prepared to tackle complex challenges and create meaningful impact. With our flexible learning model, you can pursue your passions, connect disciplines, and craft your own unique educational journey.

hero.title: Who do you learn from?
hero.description1: At Taejae University, you'll learn from some of the brightest minds in the world. Our professors are more than teachers—they're global experts, researchers, and mentors from prestigious institutions who are deeply invested in your growth.
hero.description2: Whether you're in an immersive online classroom or exploring real-world challenges through hands-on programs, they'll guide you every step of the way. With our flexible hybrid model, you can connect with these world-class faculty from anywhere, and experience a truly international and personal education.

hero.description1: At Taejae University, learning goes beyond traditional study—it's about becoming a person who can thrive in a rapidly changing world.
hero.description2: Our curriculum is designed around six core competencies that shape both our academic and everyday practices: Critical Thinking, Creative Thinking, Self-Directed Learning, Communication & Collaboration, Diversity & Empathy, and Global Harmony & Sustainability. These values are not just ideals—they guide every decision we make, from classroom instruction to institutional strategy.
hero.description3: In your first year at the School of Innovation Foundations, you'll develop the ability to think critically and creatively, take ownership of your learning, and collaborate with peers from around the world. As you grow into a skilled communicator, team player, and compassionate global citizen, you'll lay a strong foundation for your academic journey.
hero.description4: From your second year onward, through the School of Future Convergence Major, you'll deepen the six core competencies while pursuing specialized programs tailored to your academic pathway. Whether you're addressing real-world challenges or exploring bold ideas, you'll be equipped not just to keep pace with a rapidly changing world—but to lead it into the future.

criticalThinking.title: Critical Thinking
criticalThinking.description: Critical thinking is the ability to think analytically and systematically, examining information and ideas with depth and precision. You can apply critical thinking to evaluate diverse perspectives, uncover underlying assumptions, and assess the strength of arguments. This empowers you to make informed decisions and solve complex problems with clarity, logic, and confidence.

creativeThinking.title: Creative Thinking
creativeThinking.description: Creative thinking is the ability to generate original, innovative, and practical solutions by thinking beyond conventional boundaries. You can develop creative thinking at Taejae by exploring diverse heuristics, practicing problem-solving strategies, and applying fresh ideas in real-world contexts. This enables you to approach challenges with curiosity, embrace bold intellectual risks, and lead meaningful, transformative change.

selfDirectedLearning.title: Self-Directed Learning
selfDirectedLearning.description: Self-directed learning is the ability to take initiative, set goals, and manage your own learning process in a purposeful and reflective way. Throughout your academic journey at Taejae, you'll develop this skill by identifying your learning needs, seeking out resources, and regularly assessing your progress—both inside and outside the classroom. In the end, you will become a lifelong learner, ready to adapt to new challenges and pursue personal and professional growth with independence and confidence.

communicationCollaboration.title: Communication & Collaboration
communicationCollaboration.description: Communication and collaboration involve the ability to express ideas clearly, listen actively, and work effectively with others to achieve shared goals.

diversityEmpathy.title: Diversity & Empathy
diversityEmpathy.description: Diversity and empathy involve understanding, respecting, and valuing different perspectives, backgrounds, and experiences while developing the ability to connect with others on a deeper level.

globalHarmony.title: Global Harmony & Sustainability
globalHarmony.description: Global harmony and sustainability involve understanding the interconnectedness of environmental, social, and economic systems and acting responsibly to promote their long-term well-being. At Taejae, you'll cultivate this competency by studying sustainable practices, reflecting on global challenges, and designing innovative solutions that balance the needs of people and the planet. This prepares you to make decisions that foster a sustainable future and contribute positively to communities worldwide.

hero.subtitle: Visions & Goals
hero.description1: It is our educational philosophy to foster your critical and creative thinking for global harmony and sustainability. We are committed to nurturing you as global leaders equipped with the vision, agility, and integrity to navigate and shape a rapidly evolving world.
hero.description2: Grounded in our belief in the power of education to unite humanity, we are committed to nurturing you into a leader who bridges Eastern and Western cultures, contributes to a sustainable future, and leads with empathy and innovation.
hero.infinityText: Explore an infinite range of possibilities at Taejae. Shape your own academic journey. Grow exponentially.

innovationFoundations.title: School of Innovation Foundations
innovationFoundations.subtitle: Begin your learning journey grounded in six competencies in First year.
innovationFoundations.description1: At the School of Innovation Foundations, your learning experience starts with you. As a first-year student, you'll begin with Innovative Foundation—a one-year mandatory module designed to help you thrive in a rapidly changing world. This foundational program focuses on six key competencies: critical thinking, creative thinking, self-directed learning, empathy and diversity, communication and collaboration, and global harmony and sustainability.
innovationFoundations.description2: Through this module, you'll gain the tools to think deeply, act thoughtfully, and lead with purpose. You'll build not only a strong academic base but also the mindset and skills needed to engage meaningfully with others and create positive change.
innovationFoundations.description3: Learning here is anything but passive. You'll dive into hands-on projects, group challenges, and real-world case studies that turn ideas into action. Our classrooms are dynamic, collaborative spaces where you're encouraged to question, create, and grow.
innovationFoundations.description4: Whether you're discovering new passions or preparing for a specific path, the School of Innovation Foundations is where your journey as a future-ready, globally minded changemaker truly begins.

futureConvergence.subtitle: Design your own learning pathway from Year 2 to Year 4
futureConvergence.description1: Beginning in your second year, you'll shape your own academic journey by choosing courses that align with your interests and aspirations. These courses are offered across four interdisciplinary academic programmes:
futureConvergence.description2: With support and mentorship from dedicated faculty, you'll design a personalized learning pathway that reflects your goals. At Taejae, your education is not predefined—you have the freedom to explore, combine, and deepen your areas of focus as you choose. This is your opportunity to create an academic track that's uniquely yours.

activeLearning.title: What is Active Learning?
introduction: At Taejae, learning isn't something that just happens to you — it's something you actively do. Instead of memorizing facts or passively listening, you'll take part in discussions, solve real-world problems, and collaborate with others to make sense of complex ideas. This is what we call Active Learning — and it's at the core of everything we do.
To support your learning, we use a Tripartite Instructional Model that breaks the class experience into three parts:

steps.title:
Step 1. Pre-class:
Your Time to Explore and Think Ahead
description: Before joining the live online active learning sessions, Pre-class is your chance to dive into the material on your own and start expanding your own thinking. During this time, you'll engage with video lectures, reading materials, and quizzes that introduce the key concepts of the upcoming class.

This stage isn't just about absorbing information — it's about taking control of your learning. You explore ideas independently and begin to form your own perspectives and questions. By doing this, you prepare yourself to actively contribute to class discussions, team projects, and other interactive activities.
In short, Pre-class is your personal launchpad — a time to build a foundation, spark curiosity, and bring your own unique ideas to the learning journey.

steps.title:
Step 2. In class:
Engage, Collaborate, and Create Together

essence.title:
So the essence of Active
Learning is…
description: This whole Active Learning process isn't just about getting through the material. It's about helping you think critically, solve problems creatively, and grow into someone who can confidently navigate a rapidly changing world.

Whether you're debating a perspective you don't agree with, stepping into real-world scenarios through role play, or creating something new as part of a team, you will be fully immersed. Beyond intellectual growth through pre-reading and in-class activities, you will engage in dynamic interactions with your peers on real-world problems, activating one another's insights. Together, you will collaboratively create the wisdom of crowds.
In essence, the goal of Active Learning is for you to think deeply, engage actively, and build skills that will stay with you long after class ends.
At Taejae, learning is never passive. You're not just a student. You're a thinker, a creator, and a problem solver.
And we're here to support you every step of the way.

engageli.title: Engageli: Real-time Active Learning Platform
description: At Taejae University, your learning doesn't stop at borders. With Engageli program, our powerful digital classroom platform, you can fully participate in live, interactive classes—wherever you are in the world.

Engageli makes learning feel personal and engaging. You'll collaborate at virtual tables, ask questions in real time, use shared whiteboards, and get meaningful feedback through tools that track your progress.
Your instructors use this data to adjust how they teach—so you get exactly the support you need to succeed.
Recognized as one of the world's leading EdTech innovations, Engageli helps make your Taejae education flexible, interactive, and future-ready.

Using the Engageli platform, the entire class sessions are recorded in real time. The results are then summarized in an infographic format. Professors receive this feedback, which includes insights into student engagement, participation, and perceived difficulty of the class. They can immediately incorporate these findings into the planning and delivery of the next session.
